page.title: 20Darlington's Dolphin Centre
page.content: .{ }In the{Dolphin Centre}there are about 20 activities which any member of the family can enjoy e.g. {badminton, squash, tennis etc. If mothers want to have a game of squash but can't leave their children at home, they can leave them in the{creche}and then collect them later. There are{4 swimming pools, Training, Toddlers, Diving and Race. There are about 100 staff employed and to become a staff member you must go on a training course. There are 4 halls, Main-sports, Pro- jectile/practice, Spectators and Central Hall used for{concerts. In a year there are about 200, 000 swimmers and overall about 400,000 people a year come to the Dolphin Centre, which has a financial turnover of about 4 million pounds annually.{ { Louise Davis.
